subject: Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Sports Injuries
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Animal Kingdom, who was bumped and nearly unseated his jockey in the opening strides of the Belmont Stakes, has an injury to his left hind leg.
snippet: Animal Kingdom, who was bumped and nearly unseated his jockey in the opening strides of the Belmont Stakes, has an injury to his left hind leg.
